actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to establish a separate judicial district for the counties of Nassau and Suffolk, NY.

summary.text: Divides the Eastern judicial district of New York into two new districts, the Northeastern District comprised of Nassau and Suffolk counties and the Southeastern District, comprised of Kings, Queens, and Richmond Counties.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to establish a separate judicial district for the counties of Nassau and Suffolk, NY.
